title: SIGNS
fullText:
Where heating cables are installed, suitable signs drawing attention to their existence shall be provided in each location.
Where appropriate, signs warning of the danger of covering embedded heating equipment with furnishings or building materials that might cause excessive temperatures shall be provided.
This requirement may be satisfied byâ€”
(a)	clearly and permanently marking the functional switch or switches in the heated room or area; or
(b)	providing suitable labelling at the relevant distribution board.
